title: Provide better error messages for mis-configured Zookeeper ensemble connection strings
description:
From the user's list:

The person specified the Zookeeper connection string as:
SOLR_ZK_ENSEMBLE=zookeeper1:2181/solr,zookeeper2:2181/solr,zookeeper3:2181/solr

Here's a snippet:
Depending on how or where I set the Zookeeper ensemble details I get different results.

We should detect this kind of thing and produce an informative error message.

This particular user was using Cloudera Search, but I think this is a fairly generic issue that is common to vanilla Solr.
